title: Fonseka refuses to accept any position under incumbent President
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Field Marshal Sarath Fonseka has refused to accept any position under President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.
The opposition lawmaker has condemned any attempt to mislead the people through false propaganda.
He says he will stand unconditionally with the demands of the people involved in peaceful protests.
The parliamentarian said he will not be a part any process on resolving the crisis without consulting the protestors at Galle Face.
North Korea Confirms 1st Covid Case, Declares “Severe National Emergency”
